title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 155.2 - Channel
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 155.2 - Channel

State Regulations
(a) Waterford to

Oswego route. Minimum bottom width, land line, earth
section............ 104 feet

Width of channel, water surface, land line, earth section............ 160 feet

Minimum bottom width, land line, rock section............ 120 feet

Bottom width of channel in canalized rivers, generally............ 200 feet

Design depth............ 14 feet
(b) All other routes. Minimum bottom width, land line, earth section............ 75 feet

Width of channel, water surface, land line, earth section............ 123 feet

Minimum bottom width, land line, rock section............ 94 feet

Bottom width of channel in canalized rivers, generally............ 200 feet

Design depth............ 12 feet
(c) Change of depth notices are published by
the Canal Corporation and can be obtained from the Canal Corporation, P.O. Box
189, Albany, NY 12201 or by accessing the Notices to Mariners posted on the

Canal Corporation's website. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
155.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
